text: Facing angle of the entity (Yaw).

Target to fully delete.

When picked up, activates this target.
Name of the entity for events.
For teamed items, this is the name that teams them.
Color of the light entity.
Sets the outer cone angle if this light is a spot light.
Distance in world units (from player's view position) in which the light is fully faded out and not rendered.
Intensity scalar for the light.
Sets the radius of a dynamic shadow light. Becomes a dynamic light if this is bigger than 0.
Shadow map resolution; leave blank to automatically determine from radius.
The distance in world units (from player's view position) in which fading begins.
Appearance of the dynamic light. See Notes.
Light entity to pick up style ID from.
Overrides dirt mapping choice from compiler.
Minimum light for all surfaces.
Textures to exclude from minlighting.
Color taken by minlight.
If checked, allows the use of double-sided faces.

Bitflag that specifies which channels should undergo transparency. 0 = legacy behavior. Formula for every bitflag is 2^(X-1), so for channels 4, 13 and 20, it would be 2^(4-1)+2^(13-1)+2^(20-1) = 2^3+2^12+2^19 = 8+4096+524288 = 528392
If checked, enables phong shading in the brush.
If Phong Shading is enabled, specifies the lighting angle.
If checked, the entity casts a shadow.
If checked, casts a shadow over itself.
End frame of alternate animation.
